Where do I go to change the default musi: do you mean for a particualr file like mp3?
I set a keyboard shortcut to open the default music player; it's currently set as Rhythmbox. I want the default to be Amarok so the shortcut opens it.

there is a bug in gnome which doesn't let you change the default player.  It is fixed in new version for Gutsy Gibbon,  For a work around try opening a terminal and typing   sudo ln -s /usr/bin/amarok /usr/local/bin/rhythmbox

you can always type /usr/bin/rhythmbox to launch it explicitly
